file_id: An identifier (UUID) to uniquely identify the file in PDC (e.g. 795dd383-5efd-484b-9c2f-f061ae617fc7)
file_submitter_id: An identifier provided by the file submitter
study_id: Unique PDC identifier for the study (e.g. b91a0119-f3a0-11ea-b1fd-0aad30af8a83)
study_name: Full name of the study (e.g. Prospective Breast BI Acetylome)
study_submitter_id: Unique identifier deriving from the data submitter used for the study (e.g. S046-1-CompRef)
study_run_metadata_id: An identifier (UUID) to uniquely identify the group the files generated in a single experimental run in PDC (e.g. f2c5c6bf-f40d-11e8-a44b-0a9c39d33490)
study_run_metadata_submitter_id: An identifier provided by the submitter to identify the group the files generated in a single experimental run (e.g. SRM25730263-1)
file_format: File format of the underlying data (eg BCR XML, BAM)
data_category: Category description of the underlying data (e.g. Clinical, Raw Sequencing Data, Simple Nucleotide Variation, Transcriptome Profiling)
file_size: The size of the file measured in bytes
fraction_number: Number of fractions in the experimental run
experiment_type: General strategy used for differential analysis
analyte: Type of peptide or protein enrichment
instrument: Make and model of the mass spectrometry instrument
file_location: Physical location of the file on the server
url: PDC datastore file paths (typically hosted on AWS)
case_id: An identifier (UUID) to uniquely identify the case in PDC  (e.g. 0067a0e0-63d8-11e8-bcf1-0a2705229b82)
entity_id: An identifier (UUID) to uniquely identify the entity in PDC  (e.g. 2a6b4244-6428-11e8-bcf1-0a2705229b82, which refers to an aliquot)
entity_submitter_id: An identifier provided by the data submitter
entity_type: Associated entity type (e.g. aliquot or case)
